title: Saint Nicholas Rescuing Three Youths from a Tub
description: Saint Nicholas Rescuing Three Youths from a Tub; Master of the Lübeck Bible (Flemish, about 1485-about 1520); Ghent, Belgium; about 1510 - 1520; Tempera colors, gold, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 23.2 x 16.7 cm (9 1/8 x 6 9/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 18, fol. 261v; J.
